structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Persons serving as county judge/executive during emergency -- How long.
law.text:
Any of the persons designated herein to serve in the line of succession to the county judge/executive during such state of emergency shall occupy and serve in the office of county judge/executive:
Only until, if and when, the regular county judge/executive should return to the county from absence during the emergency or should recover from disability; or
Until the Governor of the Commonwealth is able to make an appointment of a successor to the regular county judge/executive; or
Until the termination of the state of emergency, whichever should occur soonest.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 490, effective January 2, 1978.
